attributes.action: Police have said the BBC acted illegally over the Cliff Richard house search.  It MUST be that ALL taxpayer funding of the BBC be stopped IMMEDIATELY.
attributes.additional_details: Taxpayers are fed up to the back teeth of being forced, by law, to fund the illegal, deceptive and downright dishonest activity of the BBC by fat cats who consider themselves above the law (and are repeatedly proved to be by the failure of our elected dishonourables to take the right action to put a stop to them) and are protected from the consequences of their illegal actions because the Licence Tax Payer ALWAYS gets to pick up the tab.  THIS MUST STOP AND IT MUST STOP NOW!
